gobblin.util

Class SerializationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.SerializationUtils

  • public class SerializationUtils
extends Object
    A utility class for serializing and deserializing Objects to/from Strings.

    • Constructor Summary

      SerializationUtils()

      Deserialize a String obtained via serialize(Serializable) into an object, using the given BaseEncoding, which must be the same BaseEncoding used to serialize the object.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public static <T extends Serializable> String serialize(T obj)
                                                 throws IOException
        Serialize an object into a String. The object is first serialized into a byte array, which is converted into a String using BaseEncoding.base64().
        Parameters:
        obj - A Serializable object
        Returns:
        A String representing the input object
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to serialize the object

      • serialize

        public static <T extends Serializable> String serialize(T obj,
                                                        BaseEncoding enc)
                                                 throws IOException
        Serialize an object into a String. The object is first serialized into a byte array, which is converted into a String using the given BaseEncoding.
        Parameters:
        obj - A Serializable object
        enc - The BaseEncoding used to encode a byte array.
        Returns:
        A String representing the input object
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to serialize the object

      • deserialize

        public static <T extends Serializable> T deserialize(String serialized,
                                                     Class<T> clazz)
                                              throws IOException
        Deserialize a String obtained via serialize(Serializable) into an object, using BaseEncoding.base64().
        Parameters:
        serialized - The serialized String
        clazz - The class the deserialized object should be cast to.
        Returns:
        The deserialized object
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to deserialize the object

      • deserialize

        public static <T extends Serializable> T deserialize(String serialized,
                                                     Class<T> clazz,
                                                     BaseEncoding enc)
                                              throws IOException
        Deserialize a String obtained via serialize(Serializable) into an object, using the given BaseEncoding, which must be the same BaseEncoding used to serialize the object.
        Parameters:
        serialized - The serialized String
        clazz - The class the deserialized object should be cast to.
        enc - The BaseEncoding used to decode the String.
        Returns:
        The deserialized object
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to deserialize the object

      • serializeState

        public static <T extends State> void serializeState(FileSystem fs,
                                                    Path jobStateFilePath,
                                                    T state)
                                             throws IOException
        Serialize a State instance to a file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the State object type
        Parameters:
        fs - the FileSystem instance for creating the file
        jobStateFilePath - the path to the file
        state - the State to serialize
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to serialize the State instance

      • serializeState

        public static <T extends State> void serializeState(FileSystem fs,
                                                    Path jobStateFilePath,
                                                    T state,
                                                    short replication)
                                             throws IOException
        Serialize a State instance to a file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the State object type
        Parameters:
        fs - the FileSystem instance for creating the file
        jobStateFilePath - the path to the file
        state - the State to serialize
        replication - replication of the serialized file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to serialize the State instance

      • deserializeState

        public static <T extends State> void deserializeState(FileSystem fs,
                                                      Path jobStateFilePath,
                                                      T state)
                                               throws IOException
        Deserialize/read a State instance from a file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the State object type
        Parameters:
        fs - the FileSystem instance for opening the file
        jobStateFilePath - the path to the file
        state - an empty State instance to deserialize into
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to deserialize the State instance

      • deserializeStateFromInputStream

        public static <T extends State> void deserializeStateFromInputStream(InputStream is,
                                                                     T state)
                                                              throws IOException
        Deserialize/read a State instance from a file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the State object type
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream containing the state.
        state - an empty State instance to deserialize into
        Throws:
        IOException - if it fails to deserialize the State instance
